trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time type converter for a component's data field properties.
trans-unit.target: 為元件的資料欄位屬性提供設計階段型別轉換子 (Type Converter)。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter> class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter>類別是<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>通常所參考的物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，表示屬性所屬的資料繫結元件或控制項。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的來源型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的來源型別是否可以轉換為相關控制項屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sourceType" /> is a string; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="sourceType" /> 是字串則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，表示屬性所屬的資料繫結元件或控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that can be used to provide additional culture information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，可用來提供其他的文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 要從中轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to a string.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換為字串。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the converted object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含已轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="object" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="object" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，也不是字串。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，表示屬性所屬的資料繫結元件或控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of fields in the selected data source if information about them is available, using the provided context.
trans-unit.target: 如果有所選資料來源的相關資訊可用，則使用提供的內容取得該資料來源中的欄位清單。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> object containing a list of the names of fields available in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> 物件，包含資料來源中可用欄位的名稱清單。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，表示屬性所屬的資料繫結元件或控制項。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property, using the provided context.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個轉換器是否會傳回一個清單，其內含使用提供的內容，能指派到相關聯控制項屬性的所有可能值。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method is called by the designer host before the host calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>方法由設計工具主應用程式主機的呼叫之前呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> 物件，表示屬性所屬的資料繫結元件或控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object returns a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個物件是否傳回可以從清單選取的標準值集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the context is not null and can be cast to an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容不為 Null 且可轉換成 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。
